scripts.migrate:save: export $(cat .env | xargs) && cd back && npx prisma migrate save --experimental
scripts.migrate:up: export $(cat .env | xargs) && cd back && npx prisma migrate up --experimental
scripts.dev:back: cd back && npx nodemon --ext ts,graphql --watch '*' --ignore 'src/**/*.spec.ts' --exec 'ts-node' src/index.ts && npx prisma generate --watch
scripts.dev: yarn dev:front & yarn dev:back & docker-compose up db
